name: Tusa Integrated Clinic LLC
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Tusa Integrated Clinic LLC is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Tempe, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $47.6M in Medicaid payments across 149K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $47.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
